Detailed Description

A special kind of plExternalProbFunction defined by dynamically compiling source code provided by the user.

The advantage over normal plExternalProbFunction objects is that instances of this class are guaranteed to be serializable.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

plExternalProbFunctionFromSource::plExternalProbFunctionFromSource ( const plExternalProbFunction &  other)
explicit

Promote from a plExternalProbFunction.

If the object being copied is actually of the wrong type, an exception is raised.
